bot_info:
ğŸ¤– Bot information:

ğŸ’¡ For payment functionality, make sure:
1. Bot is created via @BotFather
2. Payments are enabled in bot settings
3. Correct currency is used (XTR)

ğŸ”§ Testing commands:
/test_invoice - send test invoice
/test_precheckout - testing instructions
/api_info - API information

âš ï¸ If PreCheckoutQuery doesn't come:
1. Check bot settings in @BotFather
2. Make sure payments are enabled
3. Try creating a new bot
4. Check telebot library version
5. Try switching to official API

ğŸ  API Information:

âœ… Using LOCAL Telegram Bot API
